wikipedia_page.main: This is about the British soldier; for others, see Theodore Wright (disambiguation).Captain Theodore Wright, VC (15 May 1883 – 14 September 1914) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: Theodore Wright (1883–1914) was a British soldier and recipient of the Victoria Cross.
Theodore Wright may also refer to:
Theodore Wright (1883–1914), recipient of the Victoria Cross, is buried here.
